trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SEQ_00<tab>Ruvoll Ja is brimming with ambition. ※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SEQ_01<tab>Ruvoll Ja's hopes for Mamook's horticultural prospects find him and Anggir considering how to simulate natural light. The recreation of a facility like Labyrinthos would be impractical, but other farmers have learned to prosper in harsh environs─namely those of Yyupye's Halo in Heritage Found. Hoping to find inspiration from their methods, Ruvoll Ja and Anggir accompany you to the northern reaches of Xak Tural.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SEQ_02<tab>Ruvoll Ja and Anggir are both shocked by their surroundings, oppressed by heavy storm clouds. Their interest in the foreign contraptions that light the circular garden beds, however, is undeniable, and they would begin gathering more information at once.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SEQ_03<tab>You accompany Ruvoll Ja and Anggir around Yyupye's Halo and ask the farmers about their practices. Hopefully something you learn here will be of use to Gok Golma.
※You must be accompanied by Ruvoll Ja and Anggir to complete this task. Speak with them again should you become separated.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SEQ_04<tab>Both your companions are intrigued and excited by what they have learned, but recognize that their prolonged presence might be an imposition to the farmers at work. The three of you drift a ways off to continue your conversation.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SEQ_05<tab>While not all of what you learned at Yyupye's Halo is applicable to Gok Golma, using Boonewa magicks to simulate natural light is considered as a possibility. You escort your companions back to the Ja Tiika Heartland to speak with one such Boonewa, Kageel Ja.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SEQ_06<tab>Kageel Ja is receptive to your idea but thinks it better to ask a more accomplished mage than he─namely, the Autarch of Mamook himself. Ruvoll Ja nervously consults with Zereel Ja, who defies expectation and agrees to help. He requires vessels replete with energy, however, which Ruvoll Ja eagerly promises to supply.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SEQ_07<tab>Of course, <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> are the one left to procure the supplies for said vessels, but such is a simple task for a gatherer of your standing. You set out into the forest for aetherically potent materials.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SEQ_08<tab>The Boonewa cast their magicks and, like a miracle, illuminate the gainery. Under this simulated natural light, an even greater selection of crops may flourish in Gok Golma. Soon, the people of Mamook will have produce enough to create any dish─perhaps even one that changes the course of Yak T'el's fate, as xibruq pibil did so many years ago...
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Ruvoll Ja at Yyupye's Halo.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Ruvoll Ja and have him and Anggir accompany you.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_TODO_02<tab>Gather information at Yyupye's Halo while accompanied by Ruvoll Ja and Anggir.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Ruvoll Ja at Yyupye's Halo while accompanied by him and Anggir.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Ruvoll Ja in Gok Golma.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Ruvoll Ja again.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_TODO_06<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Cenote Jayunja)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Ruvoll Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Cenote Jayunja)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Ruvoll Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Cenote Jayunja)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Ruvoll Ja)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_000<tab>Just look at our crop stores, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Mamook now has <var 1A 02 /var>choice<var 1A 01 /var> when it comes to food! We never could have seen this day if not for your help.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_001<tab>But we can still do better. More can flourish yet, I just know it!
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_002<tab>As passionate as always, I see. While I wish I could agree with you, I'm afraid we may be reaching the extent of our crop variation.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_003<tab>Currently, this forest restricts us in two ways: one, the meteorites' unique aether, and two, a distinct lack of natural sunlight. Crops that can grow under both these conditions are, unfortunately, limited.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_004<tab>Removing even one of those restrictions would certainly increase our options─assuming such a feat were possible, of course.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_006<tab>We've considered how to let sunlight in before, but it's not as easy as felling a tree or two.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_007<tab>If only we could reference another locale that cultivates flora in near-total darkness...
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_A1_000_001<tab>Like Heritage Found?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_A1_000_002<tab>Like Labyrinthos?

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_010<tab>It's true that Labyrinthos was built underground, but the sheer amount of resources required for its construction dwarfs what we can afford to do here. Perhaps there's another place we can use as a reference...

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_020<tab>That's right... When I was in Tuliyollal, I heard about what happened in Yyasulani. They say the dome is rife with lightning energies and an endless night lingers over the land.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_022<tab>Fascinating. And yet they successfully farm there?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_024<tab>Yyupye's Halo, you say? I have a permit to visit Xak Tural... Why don't we go and see it for ourselves?

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_025<tab>I also possess the requisite permissions, so I can join you. If we compare the data of this forest to that of Yyupye's Halo, we may well find a clue relevant to our current conundrum.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_026<tab>It'll be a long journey, so we haven't a moment to lose. Lead the way, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_030<tab>Thank you for escorting us.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_040<tab>To think the sun once shone so brightly here... It's a different sort of darkness than that of the Ja Tiika Heartland.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_041<tab>With lightning-aspected aether this dense in the atmosphere, it's little wonder that thick thunderclouds obscure the sky as they do.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_042<tab>I could probably stand in awe of this place all <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((night)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((night)) /var>)) /var>, but we have a duty to fulfill. We need to ask the residents here about their farming techniques.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_043<tab>We're ready when you are, so just lead the way!
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_050<tab>Let's have a look around.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Ruvoll Ja and Anggir are now accompanying you. Keep them at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>You can leave your quest companions behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with them and selecting the option to part ways.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>If you wish to have your companions join you again, return and speak with them at the original location.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>Your companions have yet to arrive. Be sure they are at your side before attempting to continue.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_062<tab>Part ways.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_063<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_070<tab>In Tuliyollal, I remember once sharing a table with a Shetona from Yyasulani. I can't imagine how they must feel to see their homeland so transformed...
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_071<tab>The infrastructure here is unlike Sharlayan, Garlean, or even Allagan technologies. I must take great care in my study of this place...
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with your companions?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_081<tab>Did something come up? That's fine, we'll be waiting by the entrance when you're done.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_082<tab>Did you have other business? We shall wait for you by the entrance, so come and find us when you're finished.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_090<tab>All right, let's get going.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_091<tab>Welcome back. Shall we?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_FARMERSA05258_000_100<tab>Hmm? Can I help you with something?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>You must be accompanied by Ruvoll Ja and Anggir and have them at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_FARMERSA05258_000_110<tab>Our little farm has caught your fancy? I can hardly blame you─keeping crops alive in environs such as these is no small feat, if I do say so myself.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_FARMERSA05258_000_111<tab>We use electrope equipment to supply our plants with the nutrients and light they require. The key to good gardening is understanding the unique needs of each species, after all.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_FARMERSA05258_000_120<tab>Humidity levels, check. As for lighting...
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_FARMERSA05258_000_130<tab>Well, as you can see, we grow our crops in circles at Yyupye's Halo.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_FARMERSA05258_000_131<tab>The reason is simple─this contraption converts lightning-aspected energy to create an ideal environment for our crops, from humidity and lighting to temperature and soil quality.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_FARMERSA05258_000_132<tab>...Hang on, I've seen you before! With Shaloaci, no? She's away on business at the moment, but I'll let her know you dropped by. She'll be sorry to have missed you.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_151<tab>So these towers act as an artificial sun for their plants...
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_152<tab>Far smaller than what we have in Labyrinthos, but no less effective for the growth of crops.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_160<tab>These folks have worked hard to achieve the impossible. I'm all the more inspired to do the same!
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_161<tab>That said, we'll be nothing but a bother if we stand around here. Let's regroup and discuss our next steps.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_FARMERSA05258_000_170<tab>The lightning may impede our farmwork, but it also energizes our towers. Both a blessing and a curse, you might say.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_FARMERSA05258_000_171<tab>To us, it's only natural that our beds are round, but developing this style of agriculture was the result of trial and error.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_100_171<tab>Light pours onto the garden beds from the tower, which seems to serve as an artificial sun.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_180<tab>I thought I'd learned a decent amount about the outside world after leaving Mamook, but I still don't know the half of it, do I...
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_182<tab>Thanks for guiding us here. This trip was well worth it.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_184<tab>Indeed. We can neither develop such infrastructure overnight, nor can we discount the differences between Heritage Found and the Ja Tiika Heartland...

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_185<tab>However, the knowledge that aspected aether may be converted into something equivalent to natural light is invaluable. We may not possess this “electrope,” but perhaps magicks can achieve a similar effect?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_186<tab>The Boonewa are peerless when it comes to magic! Let's head back and ask Kageel Ja. He's probably missing us about now anyway.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_190<tab>If we could truly create artificial sunlight... Oh, the possibilities!
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_200<tab>Hold on a moment while I fetch Kageel Ja.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_KAGEELJA_000_201<tab>Ruvoll Ja explained your idea... If you're looking to achieve the impossible with magicks, shouldn't you speak with our mightiest practitioner instead?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_203<tab>You don't mean...the Autarch!?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_KAGEELJA_000_204<tab>He's different now. And he wants the best for this gainery, same as anyone. I'm sure he'd help, if you asked.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_207<tab>...But I left. Surely I'm little more than a traitor in his eyes.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_A2_000_001<tab>He's changed his ways, I promise.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_A2_000_002<tab>Then you'll just have to win him over.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_210<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>were<var 1A 01 /var> instrumental in freeing Mamook from the shackles of blessed siblings, so I guess you'd know better than most...
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_215<tab>You're right. This is for Gok Golma─for Mamook.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_100_220<tab>Then if your mind is made up, shall we request an audience?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ZEREELJA_000_221<tab>...Masterful work.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_100_221<tab>Autarch!
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ZEREELJA_000_222<tab>Just the other day, my wife brought me a sample from your harvest. I could hardly believe how flavorful it was.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_224<tab>Thank you. It is an honor to receive such kind words.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ZEREELJA_000_225<tab>I hear that you require a Boonewa's expertise?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_226<tab>Y-Yes! We were hoping to create light here. With magic. So we can grow an even wider variety of crops!
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_228<tab>We made a journey to Yyasulani by <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s guidance and studied the agricultural techniques of Heritage Found.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_229<tab>The harsh climate there is constantly obscured by dark clouds. Yet by way of special devices, the farmers create artificial sunlight enough to maintain healthy beds of crops.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_KAGEELJA_000_230<tab>Instead of devices, we thought Boonewa magicks might achieve something similar. Do you think it possible, Autarch?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ZEREELJA_000_231<tab>Weaving illusions into reality is indeed possible for us. But you require more than simple “light,” no?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_234<tab>It is as you say. The light in question must deliver properties necessary for our plants' nutrition and at appropriate levels.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_238<tab>I am happy to explain in detail if you believe such a feat can be achieved.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ZEREELJA_000_239<tab>...It can. The magicks will require eligible vessels, however. Created from material replete with energy.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_240<tab>Understood! We'll procure whatever you need!
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_250<tab>He's cooperating... The Autarch really <var 1A 02 /var>has<var 1A 01 /var> changed.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_251<tab>Anyway, we need to gather materials for those vessels. The Autarch said rich in energy, so I know just the thing!
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_255<tab>Chunks of meteorite harvested from Cenote Jayunja. You can't get more concentrated energy than that.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_260<tab>Bark from trees of living light in Cenote Jayunja. You can't get more concentrated energy than that.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_265<tab>Meteorfish from Cenote Jayunja. You can't get more concentrated energy than that. They'll bite easily enough if you use golden stonefly nymphs.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_270<tab>This all comes down to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─bring us what we need for the vessels and we'll take care of the rest!
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_280<tab>Did you find what we need for the vessels?
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_281<tab>Perfect! This is good, concentrated energy! I'll bring it to the Autarch, and we'll get started right away.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_300<tab>Such remarkable magicks... These lights illuminate our gainery as though it were midday.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_301<tab>And you may have noticed Gok Golma's latest addition. I don't know how Ruvoll Ja and the others found time to prepare a kitchen, but it makes readying our yields for consumption easier than ever.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_303<tab>Admiring the kitchen, are you? One day, it'll make some legendary dishes─even one to rival xibruq pibil!
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_ANGGIR_000_304<tab>An admirable dream. With passion like yours, I'm certain it shall come true.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_305<tab>If we can make a meal, we can share a meal. Just like Gulool Ja Ja did on that battlefield, to end an endless war...

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_RUVOLLJA_000_306<tab>Creating a dish that brings our Iq Br'aax neighbors to the table again...this is my next hope for Gok Golma. I hope we become living proof that Mamook has changed for the better!

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_307<tab>As the gainery flourishes, so too do Ruvoll Ja's dreams for the future of his homeland. Whether Mamook will prove herself capable of restoring relations with the people of Iq Br'aax, however, remains to be seen...
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_350<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Honored<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the farmers of Gok Golma.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_351<tab>New Mamool Ja society daily quests are now available from Kageel Ja in Gok Golma.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_352<tab>Furthermore, you will be able to undertake three additional quests from Kageel Ja as a reputation bonus. This bonus is available until the daily reset time for allied society quests.

TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_353<tab>These additional quests will become available after accepting all current daily quests from Kageel Ja. Please be advised that you cannot undertake these quests if you have no remaining allowances.
TEXT_BANMAM004_05258_SYSTEM_000_354<tab>You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Veerul Ja.
